mapper.select:
SELECT CB.CASE_ID, CB.CASE_NO, CB.CASE_NAME, CB.CASE_STATE, O.ORG_NAME AS INPUT_UNIT_NAME, CB.AMOUNT_INVOLVED, CB.INPUT_TIME, CB.LATEST_POCESS_TIME FROM
(SELECT C.CASE_ID,C.CASE_NO,C.CASE_NAME,C.INPUTER,C.INPUT_TIME,C.AMOUNT_INVOLVED, C.CASE_STATE,C.RECORD_SRC,C.LATEST_POCESS_TIME,C.PROC_KEY,C.INPUT_UNIT FROM CASE_BASIC C, (SELECT S.CASE_ID FROM CASE_STEP S, ORGANISE O WHERE S.TARGET_ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE AND S.TARGET_ORG_TYPE = '3' AND O.POLICE_TYPE=2 GROUP BY CASE_ID ) SO WHERE C.CASE_ID=SO.CASE_ID) CB
(SELECT C.CASE_ID,C.CASE_NO,C.CASE_NAME,C.INPUTER,C.INPUT_TIME,C.AMOUNT_INVOLVED, C.CASE_STATE,C.RECORD_SRC,C.LATEST_POCESS_TIME,C.PROC_KEY,C.INPUT_UNIT FROM CASE_BASIC C LEFT JOIN (SELECT S.CASE_ID,O.POLICE_TYPE FROM CASE_STEP S, ORGANISE O WHERE S.TARGET_ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE AND S.TARGET_ORG_TYPE = '3' GROUP BY CASE_ID,POLICE_TYPE ) SO ON C.CASE_ID=SO.CASE_ID WHERE (SO.POLICE_TYPE=1 OR SO.POLICE_TYPE IS NULL)) CB
CASE_BASIC CB
, USER_ U, ORGANISE O, CASE_STATE CS WHERE CB.INPUTER = U.USER_ID AND U.ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE AND CB.CASE_ID = CS.CASE_ID AND CB.INPUT_UNIT = O.ORG_CODE AND CS.YISONG_STATE IN (2,3)
ORDER BY O.DISTRICT_CODE ASC,CB.INPUT_TIME DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM
(SELECT C.CASE_ID,C.CASE_NO,C.CASE_NAME,C.INPUTER,C.INPUT_TIME,C.AMOUNT_INVOLVED, C.CASE_STATE,C.RECORD_SRC,C.LATEST_POCESS_TIME,C.PROC_KEY,C.INPUT_UNIT FROM CASE_BASIC C, (SELECT S.CASE_ID FROM CASE_STEP S, ORGANISE O WHERE S.TARGET_ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE AND S.TARGET_ORG_TYPE = '3' AND O.POLICE_TYPE=2 GROUP BY CASE_ID ) SO WHERE C.CASE_ID=SO.CASE_ID) CB
(SELECT C.CASE_ID,C.CASE_NO,C.CASE_NAME,C.INPUTER,C.INPUT_TIME,C.AMOUNT_INVOLVED, C.CASE_STATE,C.RECORD_SRC,C.LATEST_POCESS_TIME,C.PROC_KEY,C.INPUT_UNIT FROM CASE_BASIC C LEFT JOIN (SELECT S.CASE_ID,O.POLICE_TYPE FROM CASE_STEP S, ORGANISE O WHERE S.TARGET_ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE AND S.TARGET_ORG_TYPE = '3' GROUP BY CASE_ID,POLICE_TYPE ) SO ON C.CASE_ID=SO.CASE_ID WHERE (SO.POLICE_TYPE=1 OR SO.POLICE_TYPE IS NULL)) CB
CASE_BASIC CB
, USER_ U, ORGANISE O, CASE_STATE CS WHERE CB.INPUTER = U.USER_ID AND U.ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE AND CB.CASE_ID = CS.CASE_ID AND CB.INPUT_UNIT = O.ORG_CODE AND CS.YISONG_STATE IN (2,3)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CB.CASE_ID) FROM
(SELECT C.CASE_ID,C.CASE_NO,C.CASE_NAME,C.INPUTER,C.INPUT_TIME,C.AMOUNT_INVOLVED, C.ACCEPT_UNIT,C.CASE_STATE,C.RECORD_SRC,C.LATEST_POCESS_TIME,C.PROC_KEY,C.CASE_TYPE FROM CASE_BASIC C, (SELECT S.CASE_ID FROM CASE_STEP S, ORGANISE O WHERE S.TARGET_ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE AND S.TARGET_ORG_TYPE = '3' AND O.POLICE_TYPE=2 GROUP BY CASE_ID ) SO WHERE C.CASE_ID=SO.CASE_ID) CB
(SELECT C.CASE_ID,C.CASE_NO,C.CASE_NAME,C.INPUTER,C.INPUT_TIME,C.AMOUNT_INVOLVED, C.ACCEPT_UNIT,C.CASE_STATE,C.RECORD_SRC,C.LATEST_POCESS_TIME,C.PROC_KEY,C.CASE_TYPE FROM CASE_BASIC C LEFT JOIN (SELECT S.CASE_ID,O.POLICE_TYPE FROM CASE_STEP S, ORGANISE O WHERE S.TARGET_ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE AND S.TARGET_ORG_TYPE = '3' GROUP BY CASE_ID,O.POLICE_TYPE) SO on C.CASE_ID = SO.CASE_ID WHERE (SO.POLICE_TYPE = 1 OR SO.POLICE_TYPE IS NULL)) CB
CASE_BASIC CB
,CASE_STATE CS,PENALTY_CASE_FORM PCE,CASE_XIANYIREN K WHERE CB.CASE_ID=CS.CASE_ID AND CB.CASE_ID=PCE.CASE_ID(+) AND CB.CASE_ID=K.CASE_ID
AND EXISTS ( SELECT U.USER_ID FROM V_USER_ORGANISE_DISTRICT U WHERE U.USER_ID=CB.INPUTER AND U.DISTRICT_CODE LIKE #{districtId}||'%' )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT U.USER_ID FROM V_USER_ORGANISE_DISTRICT U WHERE U.USER_ID=CB.INPUTER AND U.DISTRICT_CODE LIKE #{shortDistrictId}||'%' )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT U.USER_ID FROM V_USER_ORGANISE_DISTRICT U WHERE U.USER_ID=CB.INPUTER AND U.INDUSTRY_TYPE= #{industryType} )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT U.USER_ID FROM V_USER_ORGANISE_DISTRICT U WHERE U.USER_ID=CB.INPUTER AND U.ORG_PATH LIKE #{orgPath} ||'%' )
AND CB.PROC_KEY=#{procKey}
AND K.DAIBU_STATE=3 AND CS.DAIBU_STATE=2
AND CB.CASE_NO LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{caseNo}),'%')
AND CB.CASE_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{caseName}),'%')
AND PCE.IS_DQDJ =#{isDqdj}
AND CB.INPUT_TIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime},'yyyy-MM')
AND CB.INPUT_TIME < TO_DATE(#{endTime},'yyyy-MM') + INTERVAL '1' MONTH
AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'yyyy') = #{yearCode}
AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'MM') >= 01 AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'MM') <= 03
AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'MM') >= 04 AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'MM') <= 06
AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'MM') >= 07 AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'MM') <= 09
AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'MM') >= 10 AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'MM') <= 12
AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'yyyyMM') = #{monthCode}

SELECT DISTINCT CB.CASE_ID, CB.CASE_NO, CB.CASE_NAME, CB.CASE_STATE, PCE.CHUFA_TIME, CB.INPUT_TIME, CB.LATEST_POCESS_TIME, CB.PROC_KEY, (SELECT ORG_NAME FROM ORGANISE WHERE ORG_CODE=CB.INPUT_UNIT)as orgName FROM
(SELECT C.CASE_ID,C.CASE_NO,C.CASE_NAME,C.INPUTER,C.INPUT_TIME,C.AMOUNT_INVOLVED, C.ACCEPT_UNIT,C.CASE_STATE,C.RECORD_SRC,C.LATEST_POCESS_TIME,C.PROC_KEY,C.CASE_TYPE FROM CASE_BASIC C, (SELECT S.CASE_ID FROM CASE_STEP S, ORGANISE O WHERE S.TARGET_ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE AND S.TARGET_ORG_TYPE = '3' AND O.POLICE_TYPE=2 GROUP BY CASE_ID ) SO WHERE C.CASE_ID=SO.CASE_ID) CB
(SELECT C.CASE_ID,C.CASE_NO,C.CASE_NAME,C.INPUTER,C.INPUT_TIME,C.AMOUNT_INVOLVED, C.ACCEPT_UNIT,C.CASE_STATE,C.RECORD_SRC,C.LATEST_POCESS_TIME,C.PROC_KEY,C.CASE_TYPE FROM CASE_BASIC C LEFT JOIN (SELECT S.CASE_ID,O.POLICE_TYPE FROM CASE_STEP S, ORGANISE O WHERE S.TARGET_ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE AND S.TARGET_ORG_TYPE = '3' GROUP BY CASE_ID,O.POLICE_TYPE) SO on C.CASE_ID = SO.CASE_ID WHERE (SO.POLICE_TYPE = 1 OR SO.POLICE_TYPE IS NULL)) CB
CASE_BASIC CB
,CASE_STATE CS,PENALTY_CASE_FORM PCE,CASE_XIANYIREN K WHERE CB.CASE_ID=CS.CASE_ID AND CB.CASE_ID=PCE.CASE_ID(+) AND CB.CASE_ID=K.CASE_ID
AND EXISTS ( SELECT U.USER_ID FROM V_USER_ORGANISE_DISTRICT U WHERE U.USER_ID=CB.INPUTER AND U.DISTRICT_CODE LIKE #{districtId}||'%' )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT U.USER_ID FROM V_USER_ORGANISE_DISTRICT U WHERE U.USER_ID=CB.INPUTER AND U.DISTRICT_CODE LIKE #{shortDistrictId}||'%' )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT U.USER_ID FROM V_USER_ORGANISE_DISTRICT U WHERE U.USER_ID=CB.INPUTER AND U.INDUSTRY_TYPE= #{industryType} )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT U.USER_ID FROM V_USER_ORGANISE_DISTRICT U WHERE U.USER_ID=CB.INPUTER AND U.ORG_PATH LIKE #{orgPath} ||'%' )
AND CB.PROC_KEY=#{procKey}
AND K.DAIBU_STATE=3 AND CS.DAIBU_STATE=2
AND CB.CASE_NO LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{caseNo}),'%')
AND CB.CASE_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{caseName}),'%')
AND PCE.IS_DQDJ =#{isDqdj}
AND CB.INPUT_TIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime},'yyyy-MM')
AND CB.INPUT_TIME < TO_DATE(#{endTime},'yyyy-MM') + INTERVAL '1' MONTH
AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'yyyy') = #{yearCode}
AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'MM') >= 01 AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'MM') <= 03
AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'MM') >= 04 AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'MM') <= 06
AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'MM') >= 07 AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'MM') <= 09
AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'MM') >= 10 AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'MM') <= 12
AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'yyyyMM') = #{monthCode}
ORDER BY CB.LATEST_POCESS_TIME DESC

select c.*,u.user_name publishUserName ,o.org_name publishOrgName,(select count(*) from case_supervision cs where cs.user_id = #{userId} and cs.case_id = #{caseId}) supervision, o.district_code from CASE_BASIC c,USER_ u,ORGANISE o where c.inputer=u.user_id and u.org_id=o.org_code and c.CASE_ID=#{caseId}

SELECT A.CASE_ID,A.CASE_NO,A.CASE_NAME,A.INPUTER,A.YISONG_UNIT,A.YISONG_TIME,A.AMOUNT_INVOLVED,A.ACCEPT_UNIT,A.CASE_DETAIL_NAME,A.CASE_STATE,A.RECORD_SRC,A.PROC_KEY, B.ANFA_ADDRESS,B.ANFA_TIME,B.UNDERTAKER,B.PENALTY_FILE_NO,B.PENALTY_FILE_ID,B.IS_DESCUSS,B.SUBMIT_PEOPLE,B.SUBMIT_TIME,B.REMARK FROM CASE_BASIC A,PENALTY_CASE_EXT B WHERE A.CASE_ID=B.CASE_ID(+) AND B.CASE_ID=#{caseId}

SELECT C.CASE_ID, C.CASE_NO, C.CASE_NAME, C.INPUTER, C.INPUT_TIME, C.INPUT_UNIT, C.AMOUNT_INVOLVED, C.CASE_STATE, C.RECORD_SRC, C.LATEST_POCESS_TIME, C.PROC_KEY,P.PROC_DEF_ID,P.PROC_INST_ID as procInstId,S.YISONG_STATE FROM CASE_BASIC C,CASE_PROCESS P,CASE_STATE S WHERE C.CASE_ID=P.CASE_ID(+) AND C.CASE_ID = S.CASE_ID AND C.CASE_ID=#{VALUE}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CASE_BASIC CB,CASE_STATE CST,PENALTY_CASE_FORM PCF,ORGANISE O WHERE CB.PROC_KEY = 'chufaProc' AND CB.CASE_ID = CST.CASE_ID AND CB.CASE_ID = PCF.CASE_ID(+) AND CB.INPUT_UNIT = O.ORG_CODE AND CST.CHUFA_STATE = 2

SELECT CB.CASE_ID,CB.CASE_NO,CB.CASE_NAME,CB.INPUTER,CB.INPUT_TIME,PCF.CHUFA_TIME, CB.AMOUNT_INVOLVED, O.ORG_NAME AS INPUT_UNIT_NAME, CB.CASE_STATE,CB.RECORD_SRC,CB.LATEST_POCESS_TIME,CB.PROC_KEY,CST.CHUFA_STATE FROM CASE_BASIC CB ,CASE_STATE CST,PENALTY_CASE_FORM PCF,ORGANISE O WHERE CB.PROC_KEY = 'chufaProc' AND CB.CASE_ID = CST.CASE_ID AND CB.CASE_ID = PCF.CASE_ID(+) AND CB.INPUT_UNIT = O.ORG_CODE AND CST.CHUFA_STATE = 2
ORDER BY O.DISTRICT_CODE ASC,CB.INPUT_TIME DESC, PCF.CHUFA_TIME DESC
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CASE_BASIC CB,CASE_STATE CST,PENALTY_CASE_FORM PCF WHERE CB.PROC_KEY = 'chufaProc' AND CB.CASE_ID = CST.CASE_ID AND CB.CASE_ID = PCF.CASE_ID(+)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CC.CASE_ID) FROM (SELECT CB1.CASE_ID,CB1.CASE_NO,CB1.CASE_NAME,CB1.ORG_CODE,CB1.ORG_PATH FROM (SELECT CB.CASE_ID,CB.CASE_NO,CB.CASE_NAME,CB.INPUTER,CB.INPUT_TIME,PCE.CHUFA_TIME,CB.ANFA_ADDRESS,CB.ANFA_TIME, CB.AMOUNT_INVOLVED,O.ORG_CODE,O.ORG_NAME,PCE.IDENTIFY_TYPE, CB.CASE_STATE,CB.RECORD_SRC,CB.LATEST_POCESS_TIME,CB.PROC_KEY,CST.CHUFA_STATE,PCE.GOODS_INVOLVED, CX.IDS_NO,CX."NAME" AS XIANYIREN_NAME,CC."NAME" AS COMPANY_NAME,O.DISTRICT_CODE,O.ORG_PATH FROM CASE_BASIC CB,CASE_STATE CST,PENALTY_CASE_FORM PCE,CASE_XIANYIREN CX,CASE_COMPANY CC,USER_ U,ORGANISE O WHERE CB.PROC_KEY = 'chufaProc' AND CB.CASE_ID = CST.CASE_ID AND CB.CASE_ID =PCE.CASE_ID(+) AND CB.CASE_ID = CX.CASE_ID(+) AND CB.CASE_ID= CC.CASE_ID(+) AND CB.CASE_TYPE IS NULL AND CB.INPUTER = U.USER_ID AND U.ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE AND CB.CASE_STATE = 2 ) CB1, (SELECT CB.CASE_ID,CB.CASE_NO,CB.CASE_NAME,CB.INPUTER,CB.INPUT_TIME,PCE.CHUFA_TIME,CB.ANFA_ADDRESS,CB.ANFA_TIME, CB.AMOUNT_INVOLVED,O.ORG_CODE,O.ORG_NAME,PCE.identify_type, CB.CASE_STATE,CB.RECORD_SRC,CB.LATEST_POCESS_TIME,CB.PROC_KEY,CST.CHUFA_STATE,PCE.GOODS_INVOLVED, CX.IDS_NO,CX."NAME" AS XIANYIREN_NAME,CC."NAME" AS COMPANY_NAME,O.DISTRICT_CODE FROM CASE_BASIC CB,CASE_STATE CST,PENALTY_CASE_FORM PCE,CASE_XIANYIREN CX,CASE_COMPANY CC,USER_ U,ORGANISE O WHERE CB.PROC_KEY = 'chufaProc' AND CB.CASE_ID = CST.CASE_ID AND CB.CASE_ID =PCE.CASE_ID(+) AND CB.CASE_ID = CX.CASE_ID(+) AND CB.CASE_ID= CC.CASE_ID(+) AND CB.CASE_TYPE IS NULL AND CB.INPUTER = U.USER_ID AND U.ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE AND CB.CASE_STATE = 2 ) CB2 WHERE CB1.CASE_ID != CB2.CASE_ID AND CB1.INPUTER = CB2.INPUTER
)CC WHERE 1=1
AND CC.CASE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{caseName},'%'))
AND CC.CASE_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{caseNo},'%'))

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CB.CASE_ID) FROM
(SELECT C.CASE_ID,C.CASE_NO,C.CASE_NAME,C.INPUTER,C.INPUT_TIME,C.AMOUNT_INVOLVED, C.ACCEPT_UNIT,C.CASE_STATE,C.RECORD_SRC,C.LATEST_POCESS_TIME,C.PROC_KEY,C.CASE_TYPE FROM CASE_BASIC C, (SELECT S.CASE_ID FROM CASE_STEP S, ORGANISE O WHERE S.TARGET_ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE AND S.TARGET_ORG_TYPE = '3' AND O.POLICE_TYPE=2 GROUP BY CASE_ID ) SO WHERE C.CASE_ID=SO.CASE_ID) CB
(SELECT C.CASE_ID,C.CASE_NO,C.CASE_NAME,C.INPUTER,C.INPUT_TIME,C.AMOUNT_INVOLVED, C.ACCEPT_UNIT,C.CASE_STATE,C.RECORD_SRC,C.LATEST_POCESS_TIME,C.PROC_KEY,C.CASE_TYPE FROM CASE_BASIC C LEFT JOIN (SELECT S.CASE_ID,o.police_type FROM CASE_STEP S, ORGANISE O WHERE S.TARGET_ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE AND S.TARGET_ORG_TYPE = '3' GROUP BY CASE_ID,O.POLICE_TYPE) SO on C.CASE_ID = SO.CASE_ID WHERE (SO.POLICE_TYPE = 1 OR SO.POLICE_TYPE IS NULL)) CB
CASE_BASIC CB
,CASE_STATE CS,PENALTY_CASE_FORM PCE,CASE_XIANYIREN K WHERE CB.CASE_ID=CS.CASE_ID AND CB.CASE_ID=PCE.CASE_ID(+) AND CB.CASE_ID=K.CASE_ID
AND EXISTS ( SELECT U.USER_ID FROM V_USER_ORGANISE_DISTRICT U WHERE U.USER_ID=CB.INPUTER AND U.DISTRICT_CODE LIKE #{districtId}||'%' )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT U.USER_ID FROM V_USER_ORGANISE_DISTRICT U WHERE U.USER_ID=CB.INPUTER AND U.DISTRICT_CODE LIKE #{shortDistrictId}||'%' )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM V_USER_ORGANISE_DISTRICT U WHERE U.USER_ID=CB.INPUTER AND U.DISTRICT_CODE LIKE #{districtCode}||'%' )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT U.USER_ID FROM V_USER_ORGANISE_DISTRICT U WHERE U.USER_ID=CB.INPUTER AND U.INDUSTRY_TYPE= #{industryType} )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT U.USER_ID FROM V_USER_ORGANISE_DISTRICT U WHERE U.USER_ID=CB.INPUTER AND U.ORG_PATH LIKE #{orgPath} ||'%' )
AND CB.CASE_NO LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{caseNo}),'%')
AND CB.CASE_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{caseName}),'%')
AND PCE.IS_DQDJ =#{isDqdj}
AND (K.DAIBU_STATE=2 OR K.DAIBU_STATE=3)
AND K.TIQINGQISU_STATE=2
AND CB.PROC_KEY=#{procKey}
AND CB.INPUT_TIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime},'yyyy-MM')
AND CB.INPUT_TIME < TO_DATE(#{endTime},'yyyy-MM') + INTERVAL '1' MONTH
AND CB.INPUT_TIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTimeApp},'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND CB.INPUT_TIME < TO_DATE(#{endTimeApp},'yyyy-MM-dd') + INTERVAL '1' DAY
AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'yyyy') = #{yearCode}
AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'MM') >= 01 AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'MM') <= 03
AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'MM') >= 04 AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'MM') <= 06
AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'MM') >= 07 AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'MM') <= 09
AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'MM') >= 10 AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'MM') <= 12
AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'yyyyMM') = #{monthCode}

select.if:
SELECT CA.ACCUSE_ID AS ACCUSE_ID,A.NAME AS ACCUSE_NAME,A.CLAUSE,C.CASE_NO,C.CASE_ID,C.CASE_NAME, C.INPUT_TIME,U.ORG_NAME AS INPUT_UNIT_NAME FROM CASE_ACCUSE CA,ACCUSE_INFO A,
(SELECT CC.CASE_ID,CC.CASE_NO,CC.CASE_NAME,CC.INPUTER,CC.INPUT_TIME,CC.AMOUNT_INVOLVED, CC.ACCEPT_UNIT,CC.CASE_STATE,CC.RECORD_SRC,CC.LATEST_POCESS_TIME,CC.PROC_KEY,CC.CASE_TYPE FROM CASE_BASIC CC, (SELECT S.CASE_ID FROM CASE_STEP S, ORGANISE O WHERE S.TARGET_ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE AND S.TARGET_ORG_TYPE = '3' AND O.POLICE_TYPE=2 GROUP BY CASE_ID ) SO WHERE CC.CASE_ID=SO.CASE_ID) C
(SELECT CC.CASE_ID,CC.CASE_NO,CC.CASE_NAME,CC.INPUTER,CC.INPUT_TIME,CC.AMOUNT_INVOLVED, CC.ACCEPT_UNIT,CC.CASE_STATE,CC.RECORD_SRC,CC.LATEST_POCESS_TIME,CC.PROC_KEY,CC.CASE_TYPE FROM CASE_BASIC CC, (SELECT S.CASE_ID,MAX(O.POLICE_TYPE)AS POLICE_TYPE FROM CASE_STEP S, ORGANISE O WHERE S.TARGET_ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE AND S.TARGET_ORG_TYPE = '3' GROUP BY CASE_ID ) SO WHERE CC.CASE_ID=SO.CASE_ID AND (SO.POLICE_TYPE=1 OR SO.POLICE_TYPE IS NULL)) C
CASE_BASIC C
,V_USER_ORGANISE_DISTRICT U WHERE CA.CASE_ID=C.CASE_ID AND CA.ACCUSE_ID=A.ID AND C.INPUTER=U.USER_ID AND C.PROC_KEY ='chufaProc' AND CA.ZM_TYPE=1
AND U.DISTRICT_CODE LIKE #{districtId} ||'%'
AND U.ORG_CODE =#{orgCode}
AND U.INDUSTRY_TYPE = #{industryType}
AND TO_CHAR(C.INPUT_TIME,'yyyy') = #{yearCode}
AND TO_CHAR(C.INPUT_TIME,'MM') >= 01 AND TO_CHAR(C.INPUT_TIME,'MM') <= 03
AND TO_CHAR(C.INPUT_TIME,'MM') >= 04 AND TO_CHAR(C.INPUT_TIME,'MM') <= 06
AND TO_CHAR(C.INPUT_TIME,'MM') >= 07 AND TO_CHAR(C.INPUT_TIME,'MM') <= 09
AND TO_CHAR(C.INPUT_TIME,'MM') >= 10 AND TO_CHAR(C.INPUT_TIME,'MM') <= 12
AND TO_CHAR(C.INPUT_TIME,'yyyyMM') = #{monthCode}
AND C.INPUT_TIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime},'yyyy-MM')
AND C.INPUT_TIME < TO_DATE(#{endTime},'yyyy-MM')+ INTERVAL '1' MONTH
AND U.INDUSTRY_TYPE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ACCUSE_ID

SELECT A.ACCUSE_ID AS ACCUSE_ID,A.NAME AS ACCUSE_NAME,A.CLAUSE,A.CASE_NO,A.CASE_ID,A.CASE_NAME,A.ORG_CODE,A.INPUT_UNIT_NAME,A.INPUT_TIME,A.INDUSTRY_TYPE FROM (SELECT CA.ACCUSE_ID,A.NAME,A.CLAUSE,C.INPUT_TIME,U.DISTRICT_CODE,C.CASE_NO, C.CASE_ID,C.CASE_NAME,U.ORG_CODE,U.INDUSTRY_TYPE,U.ORG_NAME AS INPUT_UNIT_NAME FROM CASE_ACCUSE CA,ACCUSE_INFO A,
(SELECT CC.CASE_ID,CC.CASE_NO,CC.CASE_NAME,CC.INPUTER,CC.INPUT_TIME,CC.AMOUNT_INVOLVED, CC.ACCEPT_UNIT,CC.CASE_STATE,CC.RECORD_SRC,CC.LATEST_POCESS_TIME,CC.PROC_KEY,CC.CASE_TYPE FROM CASE_BASIC CC, (SELECT S.CASE_ID FROM CASE_STEP S, ORGANISE O WHERE S.TARGET_ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE AND S.TARGET_ORG_TYPE = '3' AND O.POLICE_TYPE=2 GROUP BY CASE_ID ) SO WHERE CC.CASE_ID=SO.CASE_ID) c
(SELECT CC.CASE_ID,CC.CASE_NO,CC.CASE_NAME,CC.INPUTER,CC.INPUT_TIME,CC.AMOUNT_INVOLVED, CC.ACCEPT_UNIT,CC.CASE_STATE,CC.RECORD_SRC,CC.LATEST_POCESS_TIME,CC.PROC_KEY,CC.CASE_TYPE FROM CASE_BASIC CC, (SELECT S.CASE_ID,MAX(O.POLICE_TYPE)AS POLICE_TYPE FROM CASE_STEP S, ORGANISE O WHERE S.TARGET_ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE AND S.TARGET_ORG_TYPE = '3' GROUP BY CASE_ID ) SO WHERE CC.CASE_ID=SO.CASE_ID AND (SO.POLICE_TYPE=1 OR SO.POLICE_TYPE IS NULL)) C
CASE_BASIC c
,CASE_STATE S,V_USER_ORGANISE_DISTRICT U WHERE CA.CASE_ID=C.CASE_ID AND C.CASE_ID=S.CASE_ID AND C.INPUTER=U.USER_ID AND CA.ACCUSE_ID=A.ID AND C.PROC_KEY ='chufaProc' AND S.LIAN_STATE>=3 UNION ALL SELECT CA.ACCUSE_ID,A.NAME,A.CLAUSE,C.INPUT_TIME,U.DISTRICT_CODE,C.CASE_NO, C.CASE_ID,C.CASE_NAME,U.ORG_CODE,U.INDUSTRY_TYPE,U.ORG_NAME AS INPUT_UNIT_NAME FROM XIANYIREN_ACCUSE CA,ACCUSE_INFO A,
(SELECT CC.CASE_ID,CC.CASE_NO,CC.CASE_NAME,CC.INPUTER,CC.INPUT_TIME,CC.AMOUNT_INVOLVED, CC.ACCEPT_UNIT,CC.CASE_STATE,CC.RECORD_SRC,CC.LATEST_POCESS_TIME,CC.PROC_KEY,CC.CASE_TYPE FROM CASE_BASIC CC, (SELECT S.CASE_ID FROM CASE_STEP S, ORGANISE O WHERE S.TARGET_ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE AND S.TARGET_ORG_TYPE = '3' AND O.POLICE_TYPE=2 GROUP BY CASE_ID ) SO WHERE CC.CASE_ID=SO.CASE_ID) C
(SELECT CC.CASE_ID,CC.CASE_NO,CC.CASE_NAME,CC.INPUTER,CC.INPUT_TIME,CC.AMOUNT_INVOLVED, CC.ACCEPT_UNIT,CC.CASE_STATE,CC.RECORD_SRC,CC.LATEST_POCESS_TIME,CC.PROC_KEY,CC.CASE_TYPE FROM CASE_BASIC CC, (SELECT S.CASE_ID,MAX(O.POLICE_TYPE)AS POLICE_TYPE FROM CASE_STEP S, ORGANISE O WHERE S.TARGET_ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE AND S.TARGET_ORG_TYPE = '3' GROUP BY CASE_ID ) SO WHERE CC.CASE_ID=SO.CASE_ID AND (SO.POLICE_TYPE=1 OR SO.POLICE_TYPE IS NULL)) C
CASE_BASIC C
,V_USER_ORGANISE_DISTRICT U WHERE CA.CASE_ID=C.CASE_ID AND CA.ACCUSE_ID=A.ID AND C.INPUTER=U.USER_ID AND C.PROC_KEY ='chufaProc' AND CA.ZM_TYPE>=1) a WHERE 1=1
AND A.DISTRICT_CODE LIKE #{districtId} ||'%'
AND A.ORG_CODE =#{orgCode}
AND A.INDUSTRY_TYPE = #{industryType}
AND TO_CHAR(A.INPUT_TIME,'yyyy') = #{yearCode}
AND TO_CHAR(A.INPUT_TIME,'MM') >= 01 AND TO_CHAR(A.INPUT_TIME,'MM') <= 03

AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'MM') >= 07 AND TO_CHAR(CB.INPUT_TIME,'MM') <= 09

SELECT C.CASE_ID,C.CASE_NO,C.CASE_NAME,T.ACCUSE_NAME FROM CASE_BASIC C, ( SELECT CASE_ID,A.NAME AS ACCUSE_NAME FROM CASE_ACCUSE_RULE_RELATION CI,ACCUSE_RULE I,ACCUSE_RULE_RELATION SA,ACCUSE_INFO A WHERE CI.rule_id = I.ID AND CI.rule_id = SA.rule_id AND SA.ACCUSE_ID = A.ID AND SA.ACCUSE_ID != 190 ) T WHERE C.CASE_ID = T.CASE_ID AND C.CASE_STATE <= 4 AND C.IS_SUSPECTED_CRIMINAL = 1

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT TB_FILTERS.CASE_ID,TB_FILTERS.CASE_NO,TB_FILTERS.CASE_NAME,TB_FILTERS.ORG_NAME,TB_FILTERS.INPUT_TIME,TB_FILTERS.LATEST_POCESS_TIME,TB_FILTERS.DISTRICT_CODE,TB_FILTERS.CASE_STATE, TB_FILTERS.IS_DESCUSS,TB_FILTERS.CHUFA_TIMES,TB_FILTERS.IS_SERIOUS_CASE,TB_FILTERS.IS_BEYOND_EIGHTY,TB_FILTERS.IS_LOWER_LIMIT_MONEY,TB_FILTERS.IDENTIFY_TYPE, (TB_FILTERS.LOWER_MONEY_FILTER+TB_FILTERS.IDENTIFY_FILTER+TB_FILTERS.DESCUSS_FILTER+TB_FILTERS.BEYOND_FILTER+TB_FILTERS.SERIOUS_FILTER+TB_FILTERS.TIMES_FILTER) FILTER_COUNT FROM ( SELECT C.CASE_ID,C.CASE_NO,C.CASE_NAME,O.ORG_NAME,C.INPUT_TIME,C.LATEST_POCESS_TIME,O.DISTRICT_CODE,C.CASE_STATE, PCE.IS_DESCUSS,PCE.CHUFA_TIMES,PCE.IS_SERIOUS_CASE,PCE.IS_BEYOND_EIGHTY,PCE.IS_LOWER_LIMIT_MONEY,PCE.IDENTIFY_TYPE, CASE WHEN PCE.IS_LOWER_LIMIT_MONEY=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END LOWER_MONEY_FILTER, CASE WHEN PCE.IDENTIFY_TYPE < 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END IDENTIFY_FILTER, CASE WHEN PCE.IS_DESCUSS=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END DESCUSS_FILTER, CASE WHEN PCE.IS_BEYOND_EIGHTY=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END BEYOND_FILTER, CASE WHEN PCE.IS_SERIOUS_CASE=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END SERIOUS_FILTER, CASE WHEN PCE.CHUFA_TIMES>1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END TIMES_FILTER FROM CASE_BASIC C,PENALTY_CASE_FORM PCE,CASE_STATE S,ORGANISE O WHERE C.INPUT_UNIT =O.ORG_CODE AND C.CASE_ID = PCE.CASE_ID AND C.CASE_ID = S.CASE_ID AND C.CASE_STATE= 2 AND S.YISONG_STATE = 1 ) TB_FILTERS ) TB_COUNT

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TB_FILTERS.CASE_ID,TB_FILTERS.CASE_NO,TB_FILTERS.CASE_NAME,TB_FILTERS.ORG_NAME,TB_FILTERS.INPUT_TIME,TB_FILTERS.LATEST_POCESS_TIME,TB_FILTERS.DISTRICT_CODE,TB_FILTERS.CASE_STATE, TB_FILTERS.IS_DESCUSS,TB_FILTERS.CHUFA_TIMES,TB_FILTERS.IS_SERIOUS_CASE,TB_FILTERS.IS_BEYOND_EIGHTY,TB_FILTERS.IS_LOWER_LIMIT_MONEY,TB_FILTERS.IDENTIFY_TYPE, (TB_FILTERS.LOWER_MONEY_FILTER+TB_FILTERS.IDENTIFY_FILTER+TB_FILTERS.DESCUSS_FILTER+TB_FILTERS.BEYOND_FILTER+TB_FILTERS.SERIOUS_FILTER+TB_FILTERS.TIMES_FILTER) FILTER_COUNT FROM ( SELECT C.CASE_ID,C.CASE_NO,C.CASE_NAME,O.ORG_NAME,C.INPUT_TIME,C.LATEST_POCESS_TIME,O.DISTRICT_CODE,C.CASE_STATE, PCE.IS_DESCUSS,PCE.CHUFA_TIMES,PCE.IS_SERIOUS_CASE,PCE.IS_BEYOND_EIGHTY,PCE.IS_LOWER_LIMIT_MONEY,PCE.IDENTIFY_TYPE, CASE WHEN PCE.IS_LOWER_LIMIT_MONEY=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END LOWER_MONEY_FILTER, CASE WHEN PCE.IDENTIFY_TYPE < 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END IDENTIFY_FILTER, CASE WHEN PCE.IS_DESCUSS=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END DESCUSS_FILTER, CASE WHEN PCE.IS_BEYOND_EIGHTY=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END BEYOND_FILTER, CASE WHEN PCE.IS_SERIOUS_CASE=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END SERIOUS_FILTER, CASE WHEN PCE.CHUFA_TIMES>1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END TIMES_FILTER FROM CASE_BASIC C,PENALTY_CASE_FORM PCE,CASE_STATE S,ORGANISE O WHERE C.INPUT_UNIT =O.ORG_CODE AND C.CASE_ID = PCE.CASE_ID AND C.CASE_ID = S.CASE_ID AND C.CASE_STATE= 2 AND S.YISONG_STATE = 1 ) TB_FILTERS ) TB_COUNT

and ( cb1.input_time >= #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and cb1.input_time < (#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} + interval '1' day) ) and ( cb2.input_time >= #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and cb2.input_time < (#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} + interval '1' day) )

SELECT B.CASE_ID,B.CASE_NO,B.CASE_NAME,B.INPUT_TIME,B.AMOUNT_INVOLVED,B.CASE_STATE,U.USER_NAME AS INPUTER_NAME, O.ORG_NAME AS INPUT_UNIT_NAME,B.PROC_KEY,B.LATEST_POCESS_TIME FROM CASE_BASIC B,USER_ U,ORGANISE O, (SELECT CASE_ID FROM CASE_STEP ,USER_ WHERE ASSIGN_PERSON = USER_ID AND ORG_ID = #{orgId} GROUP BY CASE_ID) T WHERE B.CASE_ID = T.CASE_ID AND B.INPUTER = U.USER_ID AND B.INPUT_UNIT = O.ORG_CODE
AND B.CASE_NO LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{caseNo}),'%')
AND B.CASE_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{caseName}),'%')
AND B.CASE_STATE = #{caseState}
AND B.INPUT_TIME >= #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
AND B.INPUT_TIME < #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} + interval '1' day
ORDER BY B.LATEST_POCESS_TIME DESC
select from case_basic cb where cb.case_id=#{caseId}

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN CASE_STATE = 10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS STANDED_COUNT FROM CASE_BASIC C,ORGANISE O WHERE C.INPUT_UNIT = O.ORG_CODE
AND O.DISTRICT_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#{districtCode},'%')

SELECT DISTINCT CB.CASE_ID,CB.CASE_NO,CB.CASE_NAME,CB.CASE_STATE,CB.INPUTER,CB.INPUT_TIME,CB.INPUT_UNIT, CB.PROC_KEY,CB.AMOUNT_INVOLVED,O.ORG_NAME AS INPUT_UNIT_NAME,O.DISTRICT_CODE FROM CASE_BASIC CB,ORGANISE O,CASE_STATE CT, (SELECT DISTINCT S.CASE_ID,A.ACCUSE_ID FROM CASE_ACCUSE_RULE_RELATION S,ACCUSE_RULE_RELATION A WHERE S.rule_id = A.rule_id) T WHERE CB.INPUT_UNIT = O.ORG_CODE AND CB.CASE_ID = T.CASE_ID AND CB.CASE_ID = CT.CASE_ID AND CB.IS_SUSPECTED_CRIMINAL = 1 AND CB.CASE_STATE <= 4
AND CB.CASE_NO LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{caseNo}),'%')
AND CB.CASE_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{caseName}),'%')
AND O.ORG_PATH LIKE CONCAT(#{orgPath},'%')
AND O.DISTRICT_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#{districtId},'%')
AND CB.INPUT_TIME >= #{minCaseInputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
AND CB.INPUT_TIME < (#{maxCaseInputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} + INTERVAL '1' DAY)
AND T.ACCUSE_ID IN
#{accuseId}
ORDER BY O.DISTRICT_CODE ASC,CB.INPUT_TIME DESC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CB.CASE_ID) FROM CASE_BASIC CB,ORGANISE O,CASE_STATE CT, (SELECT DISTINCT S.CASE_ID,A.ACCUSE_ID FROM CASE_ACCUSE_RULE_RELATION S,ACCUSE_RULE_RELATION A WHERE S.rule_id = A.rule_id) T WHERE CB.INPUT_UNIT = O.ORG_CODE AND CB.CASE_ID = T.CASE_ID AND CB.CASE_ID = CT.CASE_ID AND CB.IS_SUSPECTED_CRIMINAL = 1 AND CB.CASE_STATE <= 4
AND CB.CASE_NO LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{caseNo}),'%')
AND CB.CASE_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{caseName}),'%')
AND O.ORG_PATH LIKE CONCAT(#{orgPath},'%')
AND O.DISTRICT_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#{districtId},'%')
AND CB.INPUT_TIME >= #{minCaseInputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
AND CB.INPUT_TIME < (#{maxCaseInputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} + INTERVAL '1' DAY)
AND T.ACCUSE_ID IN
#{accuseId}

SELECT C.CASE_ID,C.CASE_NO,C.CASE_NAME,C.INPUT_TIME,C.CASE_STATE,C.PROC_KEY,O.ORG_NAME as INPUT_UNIT_NAME FROM CASE_BASIC C,CASE_STATE S, USER_ U,ORGANISE O WHERE C.CASE_ID = S.CASE_ID AND C.INPUTER = U.USER_ID AND U.ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE AND S.JIEAN_STATE=2
AND C.CASE_NO LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{caseNo}),'%')
AND C.CASE_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{caseName}),'%')
AND (O.ORG_CODE = #{orgId} OR O.UP_ORG_CODE = #{orgId})
and O.district_code like concat(#{districtId},'%')
AND O.ORG_PATH LIKE concat(#{orgPath},'%')
and ( C.INPUT_TIME >= #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and C.INPUT_TIME < (#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} + interval '1' day) )
and C.INPUT_TIME >= #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
and C.INPUT_TIME < (#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} + interval '1' day)
ORDER BY C.INPUT_TIME DESC

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CASE_BASIC C,CASE_STATE S, USER_ U,ORGANISE O WHERE C.CASE_ID = S.CASE_ID AND C.INPUTER = U.USER_ID AND U.ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE AND S.JIEAN_STATE=2
AND C.CASE_NO LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{caseNo}),'%')
AND C.CASE_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{caseName}),'%')
AND (O.ORG_CODE = #{orgId} OR O.UP_ORG_CODE = #{orgId})
and O.district_code like concat(#{districtId},'%')
AND O.ORG_PATH LIKE concat(#{orgPath},'%')
and ( C.INPUT_TIME >= #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and C.INPUT_TIME < (#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} + interval '1' day) )
and C.INPUT_TIME >= #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
and C.INPUT_TIME < (#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} + interval '1' day)

SELECT c.CASE_NO, c.CASE_NAME, c.INPUT_TIME, cf.FENPAI_TIME, (SELECT o.ORG_NAME FROM ORGANISE o WHERE o.ORG_CODE=c.INPUT_UNIT) AS input_org_name, (SELECT o.ORG_NAME FROM ORGANISE o WHERE o.ORG_CODE=cf.FENPAI_ORG) AS fenpai_org_name, (SELECT o.ORG_NAME FROM ORGANISE o WHERE o.ORG_CODE=cf.JIESHOU_ORG) AS jieshou_org_name FROM CASE_BASIC c,CASE_FENPAI cf WHERE c.CASE_ID=cf.CASE_ID AND c.CASE_ID=#{caseId}

SELECT C.INPUT_TIME, CT.YISONG_TIME, (SELECT O.ORG_NAME FROM ORGANISE O WHERE O.ORG_CODE = C.INPUT_UNIT) AS INPUT_ORG_NAME, (SELECT O.ORG_NAME FROM ORGANISE O WHERE O.ORG_CODE = CT.JIESHOU_ORG) AS JIESHOU_ORG_NAME FROM CASE_BASIC C, CASE_TURNOVER CT WHERE C.CASE_ID = CT.CASE_ID AND C.CASE_ID=#{caseId}
SELECT COUNT(1) from CASE_BASIC,ORGANISE WHERE INPUT_UNIT = ORG_CODE AND DISTRICT_CODE LIKE #{districtCode}||'%' AND ${conditionFormula}

SELECT DISTINCT CB.CASE_ID,CB.CASE_NO,CB.CASE_NAME,CB.CASE_STATE,CB.INPUTER,CB.INPUT_TIME,CB.INPUT_UNIT, CB.PROC_KEY,CB.AMOUNT_INVOLVED,O.ORG_NAME AS INPUT_UNIT_NAME,O.DISTRICT_CODE FROM CASE_BASIC CB,ORGANISE O,CASE_STATE CT, (SELECT DISTINCT S.CASE_ID,A.ACCUSE_ID FROM CASE_ILLEGAL_SITUATION S,ILLEGAL_SITUATION_ACCUSE A WHERE S.SITUATION_ID = A.ILLEGAL_SITUATION_ID) T WHERE CB.INPUT_UNIT = O.ORG_CODE AND CB.CASE_ID = T.CASE_ID AND CB.CASE_ID = CT.CASE_ID AND CB.IS_SUSPECTED_CRIMINAL = 1 AND CB.CASE_STATE <= 4
AND CB.CASE_NO LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{caseNo}),'%')
AND CB.CASE_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{caseName}),'%')
AND O.ORG_PATH LIKE CONCAT(#{orgPath},'%')
AND O.DISTRICT_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#{districtId},'%')
AND CB.INPUT_TIME >= #{minCaseInputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
AND CB.INPUT_TIME < (#{maxCaseInputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} + INTERVAL '1' DAY)
AND T.ACCUSE_ID IN
#{accuseId}
ORDER BY O.DISTRICT_CODE ASC,CB.INPUT_TIME DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE CASE_BASIC CB SET CB.CLUE_ID = NULL WHERE CB.CLUE_ID = #{clueId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CASE_BASIC CB ,ORGANISE O,CASE_STATE CST WHERE CB.PROC_KEY = 'chufaProc' AND CB.CASE_ID = CST.CASE_ID AND CB.INPUT_UNIT=O.ORG_CODE

SELECT CB.CASE_ID,CB.CASE_NO,CB.CASE_NAME,CB.INPUTER,CB.INPUT_TIME, O.ORG_NAME AS INPUT_UNIT_NAME, CB.CASE_STATE,CB.LATEST_POCESS_TIME,CB.PROC_KEY FROM CASE_BASIC CB ,ORGANISE O,CASE_STATE CST WHERE CB.PROC_KEY = 'chufaProc' AND CB.CASE_ID = CST.CASE_ID AND CB.INPUT_UNIT=O.ORG_CODE
